Verses: 1 yosiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Yoyaakkeem Ennum Yoodhaa Raajaavin Naalaam Varushaththile Neriyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Paaruk Indha Vasanangalai Eremiyaavin Vaai Solla Oru Pusthagaththil Ezhudhugaiyil, Eremiyaa Theerkkadharisi Avanidaththil Pesi,
2 paarukke, Unnaikkuriththu Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal,
3 nee: Ippozhudhu Enakku Aiyo! Karththar En Novai Sanjalaththaal Varththikkappanninaar, En Thavippinaal Ilaiththen, Ilaippaarudhalaik Kaanaadheponen Endru Sonnaai Engiraar.
4 idho, Naan Kattinadhaiye Naan Idikkiren; Naan Naattinadhaiye Naan Pidungugiren; Indha Muzhuththesaththukkum Ippadiye Nadakkum.

5 nee Unakkup Periya Kaariyangalaith Thedugiraayo? Thedaadhe; Idho, Maamsamaana Yaavarmelum Theengai Varappannugiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar; Aanaalum, Nee Pogum Sagala Sthalangalilum Un Praananai Unakkuk Kidaikkum Kollaipporulaagath Tharugiren Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endru Avanudane Sol Endraar.
